1.content: Alright, just click and make your own, other the top one of course.
1.title: Pick a Character

11.content:
Name: Kouyu Nekusasu
Age: 16
Home: New Domino City, Middle District (the city is now split into three parts for people to afford)
Kouyu is a kid obsessed with game of duel monsters and is almost always dueling. If he's not dueling he's usually getting in trouble.
On his 16th birthday, his mom gave him three blank cards that had belong to his now missing father. Then on a walk in Lower District he met a duelist named Fate Watcher. They dueled and Kouyu unlocked the power of the first blank card and changed a spell he had into a new card, a powerful new Nether monster and its weapon. The summoning of the beast changed Kouyu's outfit and made his normally violet eyes glow gold. It also left a strange symbol on his hand in the shape of gear with a key. After Kouyu won, Fate Watcher told him the the blank card had been part of something called the Original and there were more out there that needed to find their true owners or they may cause chaos. Since that duel Kouyu met Joel De'Arc and found that he was the true owner of the second blank card and held the symbol of a sword. The third card remains a mystery, but other Nether cards have found there owners, including the vigilante known as Phantom finding his. Another Nether holder is Miku Tenshi/Akuma, a blonde haired girl haunted by both sides of her personality. Recently Kouyu had a duel with a Nether Holder named Death Bringer who has made him question the meaning behind what he's doing.
But what will the rest of the story hold.
Kouyu uses a deck I invented that is all machines with secondary types. Symbol: Gear w/ Key
Joel uses a deck based off of female versions of the knights of the round table. Symbol: Sword
Miku uses an Angel/Demon deck. Symbol: Angel Wings or Demon Wings depending on which of her personalities is in control
Phantom uses a space deck. Symbol: Comet
Death Bringer uses a Zombie and Fiend deck. Symbol: Skull
Kouyu wears a dark blue leather jacket that is almost black, and has the Japanese symbol for luck on the back in gold. He has black pants. His short hair is black and straight, but it spikes in the back and has a white streak on either side.
11.title: Kouyu Nekusasu

111.content:
I sat in the Upper District mall and looked down at the symbol on my hand. It'd been a week since my last duel with an insane duelist by the name of Death Bringer. I'd won, but when I went to take his Nexus card, it shocked me.
This surprised me because that could only mean that he was it's true owner.
"But that's insane," I thought to myself, "Death Bringer was evil, and the Original Nexus cards are suppose to protect us all. Unless maybe it was somehow corrupted further than that others."
The sound of someone approaching reached me and I turned to see my friend Akita Yosei.
Akita was a nice enough girl with dark blue hair from Upper District. She didn't duel, but I couldn't ask for anyone better person to cheer me on.
She wore a Slifer Red girls uniform today, which she looked great in. Obviously she'd just gotten out of her after school Duel Academy class that they had at our school.
Akita didn't know much about dueling, but recently she'd been trying to learn so that she could be more help to me and the others.
"Hey Kouyu," she said, she almost never called me by the nickname K unless she was irritated, "still thinking about your duel with Death Bringer?"
"Yeah," I said, "I just can't figure it out. Death Bringer was obviously evil, but the Nexus card chose him to be its master. But Fate Watcher told me that the cards were good, if a bit chaotic at times, and that they were the only thing that could defeat the thing that was trying to corrupt the Nexus."
"Well maybe there's something wrong with the card?" Said Akita, "I mean did you see what it looked like?"
She actually made a decent point. The beast itself had been called Death Abyss Dragon and it looked like a dragon made of bone, but with rotting flesh hanging from it, and a dark shadowy aura eminating from it.
"I just don't know Akita." I said.
The sixteen year old girl smiled, "I bet I know what will cheer you up."
I looked at the girl.
"Let's...
111.title: Continue

1111.content:
My eyes went wide when I heard this.
"Who are you, and what have you done with Akita?" I asked.
"I'm serious," she said, "I've been taking that duel class for a while now and I think I'm getting pretty good. Plus it'll distract you from thinking about Death Bringer."
I thought about it, I'd heard she been improving, and she was someone I'd never gone up against before.
"Okay," I said, "but I'm not gonna use Prototype Dragon, you know, to be fair."
"Yes!" Shouted Akita as she activated her standard issue Duel Academy duel disk and she put on her pink and white duel gazer.
I stood up walked a few feet away from her, and then I took the card slots of my homemade duel disk, which I kept strapped to my leg, and attached it to the metal bracelet on my right arm.
I then took my goggle like duel gazer and placed it on my face.
"You ready Akita?" I asked.
"You bet I am." She called back.
"Then I've only got one thing to say, LET'S GET ROLLIN'!"
Kouyu: 4000
Akita: 4000
Who takes the first move?
1111.title: ...Duel!"

11111.content:
"Alright," I said as I drew five cards, "I'll go first."
I drew.
"To start I summon Mk 1-Wheelie (1000/1300) in attack mode."
(Earth, Lv. 2, Machine/Effect, Once per turn, you negate this card's destruction.)
A hole opened in the air and a nice looking motorcycle came flying out of it. The bike then transformed into a robot with MK 1 painted across its chest.
"I'll also play two face downs and end with that."
Akita drew her card.
"I'm starting off with the monster Agido (1500/1300)." Said Akita as the strange Machine like fairy with scythe like hands appeared on the field, "Now I play a facedown and attack Wheelie."
The fairy flew towards the machine with scythe hands raised.
"I activate Wheelies ability to negate his destruction." I said.
Wheelie jumped out of the way of the fairy, but it still collided with me.
Kouyu: 3500
Akita: 4000
"I end." Said Akita with a smile.
I drew and the I played a...
11111.title: Kouyu

111111.content:
"Well Akita," I said, "I have to say I'm surprised you own such an old fashioned monster like Agido, but I think I've got a way to counter any of your next moves."
I took a card from my hand.
"This card is going facedown in defense mode, and it should keep me safe."
Akita drew to begin her turn.
"I play Double summon and bring forth Heartling Fairy (1100/1200) and Fairy Queen of The North (1300/1200).
(These are OC monsters.)
(Heartling Fairy-Light, Lv.1, Fairy/Effect, When this monster is destroyed and sent the graveyard you may summon one Heartless Fairy from your hand or deck.)
(Fairy Queen of The North- Lv. 4, Fairy/Effect, If there is a Fairy Queen of The South in your hand during the End Phase of the turn this card was summoned, you special summon it then.)
There were two flashes of light and they vanished to reveal a nice figured girl in a pink skin tight outfit decorated with hearts and had fairy wings on her back, and a royal looking woman in a black skin tight outfit plus a cape on her shoulders that was decorated with imaged of turtles and she had huge butterfly wings.
"Now I activate Electronic Negator," said Akita, "which will allow me to negate the effect of one Machine type Monster's effect for the rest of the duel." (OC)
"We'll that activates my Mk 1- Gadget Blocker Trap Card." I said.
(When this card is activated summon it as monster [Lv. 4, Earth, Atk/0 Def/3000]. Once per turn when opponent activates a Spell, Trap, or Monster Effect, negate the Effect and destroy the card.)
A hole opened in the ground and an odd looking machine lifted out of it, MK 1 was painted on its side.
"Now your effect is negated."
Akita's Spell exploded.
"Fine," said Akita, "but I attack Wheelie with Queen of The North."
The fairy flew at my monster.
"I activate Wheelie's effect again." I said.
Wheelie Dodged, but the queen him me.
Kouyu:3200
Akita:4000
"Alright, get him Heartling."
The pink fairy flew at my monster.
"I activate Mk 1- Sheild." I said.
(Trap, you may negate one attack once per turn you may negate one attack.)
A lightning rod roes up from the ground and made a energy shield around my monsters and deflected the female monster.
"Well I got one final attack," said Akita, "get him Agito!"
The scythe handed fairy flew at Wheelie.
"I flip Mk 1-Stealth Defender (0/2500)." I said as my second monster flipped.
(Lv.3, Dark, Machine/Effect, This Monster is also treated as a Warrior type. If a face up monster your side of the field is made the target of an attack and this card is facedown on your field, you may make this card the Target. A monster that does battle with this defense position monster is destroyed after the damage step.)
The monster was a woman wearing a ninja outfit that didn't cover her stomach and had robotic arms with blades on them. MK 1 was tattooed to her stomach.
The defensive monster jumped in front of Wheelie and slashed Agido. The fairy broke in half.
"And now you take damage Akita." I said.
Kouyu:3200
Akita:2500
"The destruction of Agido allows me to activate Fairy Seed," said Akita, "It allows me to gain back life points equal to the number of monsters on my field times 100."(OC)
Kouyu:3200
Akita:2700
"Alright," I said as I drew a card, "my move and I..."
111111.title: Monster

1111111.content:
...summon MK1- Armored Neko (1100/1300)."
(Earth, Lv.3, Machine/Effect, This card is also treated as a Beast Type. Once per turn, you may deal 500 points of damage to your opponent.)
A hole opened in the ground and a very attractive woman in a skin cat rose out of it. The suit also had metal armoring on it and MK 1 was written on her stomach. She had metal cat tail with spike at the end.
"Now I use her effect, allowing me to deal you 500 points of damage." I said.
The cat girl's tail stretched towards Akita and her.
Kouyu:3200
Akita:2200
"I think that will do for now." I said, "right after I play this facedown."
Akita drew a card.
"Alright, everything has fallen into place for my move." Said Akita with a big smile, "I group my two monsters to create the nexus and Nexus Summon..."
Akita's fairies became a ball of yellow energy.
"...Fairy Paladin, Defender of the Throne(2700/2000)
(Light, NEX Lv.5, Fairy/Nexus/Effect, This monster may attack once for every Nexus Unit equipped to it. This Monster deals piercing battle damage. This monster cannot be destroyed by an effect monster's effect.)
The orb exploded and revealed a woman wearing a revealing light armor, and she had white butterfly wings and held a blue and gold lance in her hand.
"Now I'll equip her with Lance of the Fiary Queens to her." Said Akita.
(Equip Spell, The activation of this card may not be negated. The monster equipped with this card gains 300 ATK. If the monster equipped with this attack multiple times this turn, but deals no damage, you may attack your opponent directly, but the attack of the equipped monster is halved.)
The lance in the paladins hand glowed for a moment and grew even bigger than the holder, and its color change to white with gold markings.
"And now that she has 3000 ATK," said Akita, "I attack Wheelie."
"And I'll cancel it with the effect of Wheelie." I said.
Wheelie jumped out of the way as the paladin came flying at him, but the lance hit me.
Kouyu: 1300
Akita: 2200
"I can end this now by attacking Neko with my fairy's second attack." Said Akita as her paladin came flying at the cat girl.
"Not if I activate Mk1-Shield." I said as the attack was deflected by the lightning rod.
"Yeah," said Akita, "but that was last defense, and now with her new lance, my fairy can halve her ATK to attack directly."
The paladin's ATK dropped to 1500 and she came flying at me.
"Sorry Akita," I said, "but I activate Mk2- Shield."
(Trap, you negate two attacks per turn.)
Two lightning rods came up and blocked the attack.
Akita just smiled, "I can just end this next turn."
I drew a card.
"I'm sorry to tell you that's not gonna happen." I said.
"And why's that?" Asked Akita.
"Because I've got the perfect cards to end it right now I..."
1111111.title: Summon a monster

choices: Appears to have taken it well
11111111.content:
"...I group Armored Neko, Wheelie, and Stealth Defender to create the Nexus."
Akita gasped, "But you said you wouldn't use Prototype Dragon."
"And this isn't him." I said.
The three monster became a ball of mostly brown energy, but with purple mixed in.
"Now it's real rollin' time cause I Nexus Summon MK3-Experimental Mega Tank (3000/3000)!"
(Earth, NEX Lv.8, Machine/Nexus/Effect, When this card is first Nexus Summoned it may attack twice. You may equip any MK1 or MK2 equip spell to this card regardless of its effect.)
The orb morphed into a hole in the ground, and a huge tank with one main tank gun, plus two smaller ones mounted next to it rolled out. MK3 was written on one of it tread covers. The three monsters used to summon the war machine floated around it in spirit form.
"Wow." Said Akita.
"Yeah," I said, "I got this bad boy recently and I thought this would be great time to test him out. Now equip him with the last two cards in my hand, MK2-Mega Neko Claw and MK3-Overpowered Mega Missile."
(Neko Claw-Only equip to MK2-Twin-Tailed Armored Neko. The equipped monster gains 700ATK. During your End Phase, deal your opponent 700 points of damage.)
(Mega Missile-Only equip to MK3-Experimental Mega Tank. When the equipped monster deals damage to your opponent do to an attack on a monster, instead of dealing normal damage, your opponent takes damage equal to the original ATK of your target.)
"Wait," said Akita, "you can't equip Mega Tank with Neko Claw."
"Actually," I said, "I can due to his effect."
A clawed glove with three 2 1/2 foot long blades appeared floating above the field. It broke into three pieces that attached to the tank's gun barrel. (3000+700=3700)
"I attack your Paladin!" I shouted.
The tank got ready to fire.
"I use a Nexus unit to negate my monster's destruction." Said Akita, "Now I'll just take a total of 1400 hundred points of damage from this attack and the effect of Neko claw."
"Actually," I said with a smile, "my Mega Missile spell card makes it so that you take damage equal to the original of the monster I attacked."
"Wait," said Akita, "that means..."
"Yep." I said with a smile.
The main gun on the tank lifted up to reveal a huge missile. It fired at Paladin, but one of the spectral monsters floating around it turned into a protective shield around her that deflected the missile right at Akita.
The missile exploded on impact and knock Akita backward on to her back.
Kouyu:1300
Akita:0
I walked up to Akita and helped her to her feet. I'd heard she'd never had a loss before so I was curious to how she took her first loss
11111111.title: Nexus Summon 1

111111111.content:
I extended my hand to help Akita up, but she pushed it away and stood on her own, never really a good sign for her, but she had a big smile. Come to think of it, that's never really a good sign either.
"You okay Akita?" I asked.
"I'm fine," she said in a cheerful way that seemed forced, "I should've known better than to think I could win in a duel against you."
"To tell the truth," I said, "you had me on the ropes for a while."
"Yeah well," she said with that still forced smile, "I'll talk to you more later."
"Why?" I asked.
"I just remembered I have something I have to do today."
"We'll how about you meet here after your duel class tomorrow and give a few pointers?"
Akita smiled another forced smile and nodded.
She ran off after that like she really had to go somewhere.
I could tell the was really something wrong with her, but I thought maybe I should just give her some space, she usually figured this stuff out her own.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------
(3rd Person)
Akita had been in such a hurry to get the heck out of the mall that she had ended up running to Middle District Park. In was sunset and no one was in the park.
She was so confused, she stomped her foot on the the ground and screamed through clenched teeth, this was standard thing to do when she annoyed, irritated, or confused. Right now she was all three.
After she did this she calmed down and let out a long sigh and held the butt of her hand to her forehead.
"Why can't he just see how I feel?" she asked sadly and out loud.
She heard a familiar small laugh and some behind her said, "You've got the look of a girl who just lost her first duel."
Akita turned to see...
111111111.title: Appears to have taken it well

1111111112.content:
Then who?
Miku Tenshi ( or Akuma depending on the personality that's in control)
Joel De'Arc
Phantom
1111111112.title: Another friend of hers

choices: Take a walk in lower district
11111111121.content:
"Mi...Miku." Said Akita, then she got nervous, "I am talking to Miku Tenshi right?"
Miku smiled and held up her hand that showed an image of two spread out angel wings.
"I'm the good one," said Miku as she and Akita sat down a park bench "and I think I'm the one you look like you need to talk to. So you had your first loss or something?"
"Yes I had my first loss," said Akita, "but that isn't what I'm upset about."
"Then what is it?"
"Who I was dueling."
"What about him?"
"I've kinda got a little..." Akita paused and blushed, "...crush on him."
Miku cracked a big smile, "Akita Yosei your in love with card slinger."
"Don't call him that." Said Akita.
"I'm just using your word for it." Said Miku.
"I know, but that was only because I was trying to hide how felt for him."
"Oh," said Miku, "so we know this boy."
"Miku!"
"Okay," she said, "look, the only way to get through to a male duelist is to tell him through his deck, or telling him up front."
"Well, I just need time to think right now," said Akita, "I think I'll..."
11111111121.title: Miku

111111111212.content:
"Are you okay?" Said Miku, "Because it's almost night, and you don't exactly like walking in that part of town."
"Well," said Akita, "it always seems to fix Kouyu's problems."
"Okay," said Miku, "but you want some company?"
"No," said Akita, "I just need to be alone."
Miku nodded, and then the two girls walked their separate ways.
=========================================================
Later in Lower District, Akita was walking alone through the many alleys of this part of the city. She wasn't too worried about get attacked here though, because she knew Phantom was every where in this section of the city.
"Why can't I stop thinking about Kouyu," said Akita to herself, "he's my friend. So why feelings for him feel like more than that?"
She sighed.
"It doesn't, he doesn't even notice my feelings, it's like I don't even exist."
Suddenly she saw a flash of light behind her and spun around to see what it was.
All she saw was a card floating towards the ground
She walked towards it and picked it up as it landed.
It was blank.
"Why is it..."
She gasped as she felt a strange power corse through her, suddenly memories of today flooded through her mind and she grew angry at one person.
An image appeared on the card and she smiled, "Let's see how Kouyu likes me now."
111111111212.title: Take a walk in lower district

choices: Ima shuppatsu suru ressha wa, meihaku ni tatte kudasai!
12.content:
Name: Hikaru Hachimasu (Dub Name: Hikaru Britt)
Age: 20
Home: New Domino City, Middle District (Hikaru lives near the train station, and by extension, the rails, so he can get to work early and easily.)
Hikaru is a young man, with an interest in trains and Dueling. He lives a simple, mostly uneventful life as a railway worker, mostly doing trackwork with his fellows on the New Domino City Subways, on occasion getting called out to work on the Daedalus Bridge's under-road railway. His ultimate goal for his future is to operate one of the trains in New Domino City- it's not glamorous, but it's very important work none the less.
Hikaru is a calm sorta person. He speaks when spoken to but doesn't start conversations unless he has to, and he can be a bit harsh. Like any normal person, he gets a bit fired up when he duels. His hobbies are dueling, doing research on trains, subways, and railways, studying up on work, and taking long walks down disused subway lines.

Speaking of Dueling, Hikaru duels to pass time. He's never dueled for stakes higher than 'who buys drinks after work is complete'. He's very used to Quick Duels(half everything), but he can do Standard Duels as well. He prefers not to Speed Duel.

Hikaru's Deck focuses around the Railway Arctype, similar to Anna Kaboom. His Nether Monster, Skull Breakvan, was found on the tracks of a disused subway line. Hikaru finds a lotta Duel Monster cards on the subway lines, actually.

Nether Monster: Skull Breakvan
Skull Breakvan LEVEL 4
Archtype: Railway
Attribute EARTH
Types Machine / Effect
ATK 1000
DEF 1600
When summoned: equip this card to a member of the Railway Archtype.
While this card is equipped to a monster of the Railway Archtype,
when that monster declares an attack, you may cancel the attack of that monster.
If the monster this card is equipped to is sent to the Graveyard/Extra Deck, banish this card.
12.title: Hikaru Hachimasu

info.brief_description: A YuGiOh story taking place even further into the future, with even newer types of cards.
info.description:
This is a story of Yugioh that takes place after Yugioh Zexal. Duelist still use duel gazers and all, but now there's a new type of monster card called Nether monsters.
The basic idea is a combination between a Xyz monster and a Synchro monster. Each monster has a level called a Nether Level. The duelist removes from play a number of monsters whose combined levels equal the Nether level.
A Nether monster's abilities are accessed by remove cards from the graveyard.
The rules for this story are-
Try to stay in first person as much as possible.
You may use made up cards, but no infinitely strong monsters
Try to stick to the Yugioh Card game rules
No gay stuff
No sex (Romance is fine but these are 16 year-olds)
(Note- Kouyu Nekusasu, my character can be used in anyone's chapter, but you must ask permission and get his character right.)
In your own chapters I'd like to ask you give the option to add different character then the one your option is for.
